# Monastery (Building)
## Overview
**Monastery**

**Create** 58 Goods, 15 Influence, 53 Labor, 6 Magic (3,270 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Altar (Room)|Altar]], 1 [[Bath (Room)|Bath]], 1 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repository]], 1 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Crypt (Room)|Crypt]], 1 [[Garden (Room)|Garden]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Laundry (Room)|Laundry]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 2 [[Sanctum (Room)|Sanctums]], 1 [[Scriptorium (Room)|Scriptorium]]

A cloister for meditation and study.
